ValidationRule.description:
ONLY FOR L3 Event Record Types
Requires that the Audio Type is Event when the event is L3 and a participant list is included.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name = "L3 Dry Run,L3 Premium Event,L3 Standard Event", ISPICKVAL( Booked_With__c , "Level 3"), Participant_list_included__c = TRUE, NOT(ISPICKVAL( GX_Event_Type__c , "Event")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Level 3 with participant lists must have an Audio Type of Event.
